birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国湖南省平江县
birth_place.en: Pingjiang County, Hunan, Republic of China

death_place.zh-cn: 北京市东城区北京医院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党史专家，曾担任毛泽东的兼职工业秘书。他曾任中共中央顾问委员会委员、中共中央组织部常务副部长。晚年成为中共党内著名的自由派人物，呼吁民主宪政。
description.en: An expert on the history of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) and a former part-time industrial secretary to Mao Zedong. He served as a member of the CCP Central Advisory Commission and Executive Vice Minister of the CCP Organization Department. In his later years, he became a prominent liberal voice within the CCP, advocating for democratic constitutionalism.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China (PRC), which he led as the chairman of the Chinese Communist Party from its establishment in 1949 until his death in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 李锐的前妻。
description.en: The former wife of Li Rui.

description.zh-cn: 李锐的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Li Rui.

description.zh-cn: 李锐的女儿，传记作家、机械工程师。
description.en: Daughter of Li Rui, a biographer and mechanical engineer.

description.zh-cn: 李锐的父亲，同盟会成员，中华民国第一届国会众议员。
description.en: Father of Li Rui, a member of the Tongmenghui, and a member of the House of Representatives in the first National Assembly of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的第一代和第二代主要领导人之一，中共八大元老之一。
description.en: One of the major first and second-generation leaders of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, and one of the Eight Elders of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常委，毛泽东的政治秘书，四人帮集团主犯之一。
description.en: A member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, political secretary to Mao Zedong, and a principal member of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的优秀党员，伟大的共产主义战士，杰出的无产阶级革命家，中共党和军队卓越的政治工作领导人，陕甘边区革命根据地的主要创建者和领导者之一。
description.en: An outstanding member of the Chinese Communist Party, a great communist fighter, a distinguished proletarian revolutionary, an excellent political work leader of the CCP and the army, and one of the main founders and leaders of the Shaan-Gan-Bian Revolutionary Base.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党内保守派（左派）代表人物，曾任中宣部部长。
description.en: A representative of the conservative (leftist) faction within the Chinese Communist Party, who served as head of the Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Organization Department of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责党组织工作和干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party responsible for party organization and cadre work.

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间存在的中国共产党中央组织机构，作为废除干部领导职务终身制的过渡措施。
description.en: A central organization of the Chinese Communist Party that existed from 1982 to 1992 as a transitional measure for abolishing the lifelong tenure of leading cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会于1959年举行的一次会议，会后发起了“反右倾”斗争。
description.en: A meeting of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party held in 1959, after which the "Anti-Rightist" struggle was launched.

description.zh-cn: 1959年庐山会议上因彭德怀等人对“大跃进”提出批评而被定性的政治案件。
description.en: A political case designation from the 1959 Lushan Conference, targeting Peng Dehuai and others for their criticism of the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的，在中国发生的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A major political movement in China, launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一座主要关押最高级别政治犯的监狱。
description.en: A maximum-security prison in the People's Republic of China, primarily used for detaining high-ranking political prisoners.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, statesman, military leader, and diplomat, who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 长江三峡水利枢纽工程

zh-cn: 长江三峡水利枢纽工程

description.zh-cn: 位于中国长江上游的大型水利工程项目。
description.en: A large-scale hydroelectric gravity dam project on the Yangtze River in China.

nodes.id: 胡佛研究所图书档案馆

zh-cn: 胡佛研究所图书档案馆

description.zh-cn: 位于美国斯坦福大学的公共政策智库和研究机构。
description.en: A public policy think tank and research institution located at Stanford University in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省岳阳市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Yueyang City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 延安整风运动后期，由康生发动的抓“特务”的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement initiated by Kang Sheng during the later stages of the Yan'an Rectification Movement to identify and arrest 'spies'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国早期主要领导人之一，因“高饶事件”而倒台。
description.en: One of the early major leaders of the People's Republic of China, who fell from power due to the 'Gao Gang-Rao Shushi Affair'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责水利和电力工业的组成部门。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for water conservancy and the electric power industry.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国电力工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国电力工业部

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责电力工业的组成部门。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the electric power industry.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国的一系列学生和民众抗议活动，最终以军队清场告终。
description.en: A series of student and popular protests that took place in China in 1989, which ended with a military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 河南籍作家。
description.en: A writer from Henan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，中华人民共和国改革开放和现代化建设的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Chinese Communist Party, and the chief architect of China's reform and opening-up and modernization.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席和总书记，是改革开放早期平反冤假错案和真理标准大讨论的具体执行者。
description.en: Served as Chairman and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party, and was a key implementer of rehabilitating victims of wrongful cases and the great discussion on the criterion of truth during the early stages of reform and opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 李锐出生于中华民国湖南省平江县长寿镇。
description.en: Li Rui was born in Changshou Town, Pingjiang County, Hunan Province, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李南央是李锐的女儿。
description.en: Li Nanyang is the daughter of Li Rui.

description.zh-cn: 李南央是范元甄的女儿。
description.en: Li Nanyang is the daughter of Fan Yuanzhen.

description.zh-cn: 李锐是李积芳的儿子。
description.en: Li Rui is the son of Li Jifang.

description.zh-cn: 李锐与范元甄于1939年结婚，1961年离婚。期间曾因范元甄与邓力群有染而短暂离婚后复婚。
description.en: Li Rui married Fan Yuanzhen in 1939 and they divorced in 1961. During this period, they briefly divorced and remarried after Fan Yuanzhen had an affair with Deng Liqun.

description.zh-cn: 李锐于1979年10月与张玉珍结婚。
description.en: Li Rui married Zhang Yuzhen in October 1979.

description.zh-cn: 1934年考入国立武汉大学工学院机械系，1937年5月离开。
description.en: He was admitted to the Department of Mechanical Engineering, School of Engineering, National Wuhan University in 1934, and left in May 1937.

description.zh-cn: 1937年5月加入中国共产党，1960年3月被开除党籍，1979年获平反后恢复党籍。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Communist Party in May 1937, was expelled in March 1960, and had his membership restored after his rehabilitation in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 1958年南宁会议后，李锐被任命为毛泽东的兼职工业秘书。
description.en: After the Nanning Conference in 1958, Li Rui was appointed as Mao Zedong's part-time industrial secretary.

description.zh-cn: 1945年后到东北，先后任高岗、陈云的秘书。
description.en: After 1945, he went to Northeast China and served as a secretary to Gao Gang and Chen Yun.

description.zh-cn: 1945年后到东北，先后任高岗、陈云的秘书。
description.en: After 1945, he went to Northeast China and served as a secretary to Gao Gang and Chen Yun.

description.zh-cn: 依中共元老陈云的推荐，李锐于1982年出任中共中央组织部常务副部长。
description.en: On the recommendation of CCP elder Chen Yun, Li Rui was appointed Executive Vice Minister of the CCP Organization Department in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 在延安的抢救运动中，李锐被指为特务并被关押一年多。
description.en: During the Rescue Movement in Yan'an, Li Rui was accused of being a spy and was imprisoned for over a year.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年的庐山会议上，李锐被定为“彭德怀反党集团成员”，被撤销一切职务并开除党籍。
description.en: At the 1959 Lushan Conference, Li Rui was designated a member of the 'Peng Dehuai Anti-Party Clique', stripped of all his posts, and expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年的庐山会议上，李锐被定为“彭德怀反党集团成员”。
description.en: At the 1959 Lushan Conference, Li Rui was designated a member of the 'Peng Dehuai Anti-Party Clique'.

description.zh-cn: 在“文革”期间，李锐因得罪中央政治局常委陈伯达，于1967年11月11日被关押在秦城监狱，直至1975年5月30日释放。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Li Rui offended Politburo Standing Committee member Chen Boda and was imprisoned in Qincheng Prison from November 11, 1967, until his release on May 30, 1975.

description.zh-cn: 因在六四事件期间联名呼吁学生与部队双方撤退，之后在中顾委挨批，不予“党员登记”。
description.en: Because he co-signed an appeal for both students and troops to withdraw during the June Fourth Incident, he was criticized by the Central Advisory Commission and denied 'party member registration'.

relationships.target: 长江三峡水利枢纽工程

description.zh-cn: 李锐是中国主要的三峡工程反对派代表人物，著书并多次上书高层指出其弊端。
description.en: Li Rui was a leading representative figure opposing the Three Gorges Dam project, authoring a book and repeatedly submitting letters to high-level officials pointing out its drawbacks.

description.zh-cn: 李锐晚年批评毛泽东当年犯过错误。
description.en: In his later years, Li Rui criticized Mao Zedong for mistakes he had made.

description.zh-cn: 李锐晚年公开批评习近平的文化水平只有小学程度，并指责其搞个人崇拜和废除领导干部任期限制。
description.en: In his later years, Li Rui publicly criticized Xi Jinping, stating his educational level was only that of primary school and accusing him of promoting a personality cult and abolishing term limits for leading cadres.

description.zh-cn: 李锐是中共元老习仲勋的好友，并一直称赞其人品。
description.en: Li Rui was a friend of CCP elder Xi Zhongxun and always praised his character.

description.zh-cn: 1943年在李锐被斗时，范元甄与邓力群有染。
description.en: In 1943, while Li Rui was being politically persecuted, Fan Yuanzhen had an affair with Deng Liqun.

relationships.target: 胡佛研究所图书档案馆

description.zh-cn: 李南央遵从父亲李锐的意愿，将李锐日记捐赠给美国斯坦福大学胡佛研究所。
description.en: Following her father Li Rui's wishes, Li Nanyang donated his diaries to the Hoover Institution at Stanford University in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 李锐去世后，其遗孀张玉珍在北京法院起诉继女李南央，要求讨回李锐日记。
description.en: After Li Rui's death, his widow Zhang Yuzhen sued her stepdaughter Li Nanyang in a Beijing court, demanding the return of Li Rui's diaries.

description.zh-cn: 河南籍作家王西亮于2011年在《信阳日报》撰文，对李锐的政治立场和以“毛泽东秘书”身份出书的行为提出质疑和批评。
description.en: In 2011, Henan writer Wang Xiliang wrote an article in the Xinyang Daily, questioning and criticizing Li Rui's political stance and his actions of publishing books under the title of 'Mao Zedong's Secretary'.

description.zh-cn: 李锐曾大肆歌颂胡耀邦，称其为“中国的希望”。
description.en: Li Rui once lavishly praised Hu Yaobang, calling him 'the hope of China'.

description.zh-cn: 李锐曾大肆歌颂邓小平，但在其1997年逝世后转为批评。
description.en: Li Rui once lavishly praised Deng Xiaoping, but turned to criticism after his death in 1997.
